tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Checking google reviews I visited Dr.vidya for my pregnancy care and I was completely satisfied with her treatment.
She was positive and encouraged us not to panic when low risk complications were there. She had complete knowledge and explained us patiently in detail of what‚Äôs next. She was easily approachable and I was able to contact her anytime through messages especially during lockdown period.
The best thing was she reduced my medicines dosage and in a month, YES my thyroid and glucose level fell into normal range. Also she prescribed only necessary tests.

Clinic was neat, COVID protocol was always followed and No much waiting time. Consultation fee and medicine rate was also reasonable.
A big thumbs up and I would definitely recommend Dr.Vidya. Thank you Doctor for being friendly and supportive in all these 7 months.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I suffer from PCOS and I've been to many doctors for the same. As much as we find internet to be the best source for all the information regarding PCOS, we always seek certain kind of personalised advice from a doctor. The doctors I have been to would prescribe medicines to correct irregular periods and would tell me to lose weight. These were the standard instructions I got from most of the doctors. But, to lose weight systematically, keeping in mind of the condition that I suffer from was very important. Dr. Vidya explained every bit of what PCOS is and how to go about with it. She was kind enough to make a diet plan and advised to go the natural way instead of taking hormonal pills or any of that kind. I would definitely recommend her to anyone I know who is going through gynecological problems. I was really impressed by her personalised way of treating patients and the attention she gives to you as a doctor. She is friendly and unlike the other doctors I've met, she is a good listener. As a patient, I've found a good doctor after many years and I can clearly say that I am satisfied with my experience.

reply_text:
First of all ur consultation was not at my clinic but was a video call
Second, your issue was not urine infection but something else , i have proof of your prescription 
Your issue very much needed a physical examination and could not be tackled on phone and you stay in a different city from mine 
I even requested you to send a pic for which u refused
You were given an emperical treatment at the end of consultation with all medicines explained in the prescription 
Before ending the call , you were asked if  you have further questions for which you said no and ended the call.and i was not in a hurry 
What I could do with in the scope of teleconsultation i did
There is no such diet or habits that can prevent your problem
Yes, you were Told what to follow and what not at the end 
Get wel soon and see a doctor personally for the same 
Good luck

review: she doesn't tell anything , no explanation doesn't really explain anything doesn't value  of money time everything doesn't even see the reports shared
reply_text:
First of all
1.you had consulted for pcos and also for another reason which u know v well . so two issues were there 
2. All reports were reviewed and also advised 
3.Explanation lasted for fifteen mins and an online consult is timed for fifteen minutes only and was well within the slot 
4.you asked extra questions on diet which could have easily been brushed off to a nutrition specialist but still guidance was given 
5. Your condition was such that you required a personal visit and ultrasounds which unfortunately cannot be given on teleconsultation , hence you were asked to visit a  specialist  personally as you were staying  abroad 
6. Blaming us saying we dont see reports , we have not even given u treatment or solution is totally wrong. We cannot simply put a patient on medicines without having the beef or tools for check ups . i heard u with lot of patience and very well remember what we spoke regarding your health 
What best could be offered in fifteen minutes and with in scope of teleconsultation has been given to u . 
Unfortunately ur issue is something which cannot be tackled online 
Wish you good luck
